tool.name: GFF converter

param.name: infile_fasta
param.label: Sequence file
param.help: The FASTA sequence file, which is associated with the GFF file.

tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**Note**. The FASTA identifier and the GFF identifier should be shorter than 16 characters if you want to use it in GenBank files. Please adjust the header or that tool tries to automatically shorten the header.
**What it does**
This tool extracts the annotated sequences in a gff file and generates a embl or genbank file.
